channel.title: How do you change the color of text on your client?
channel.description: like... instead of having to do red:, i wanna know how to make it so it duz it for u on your client so u can type like... 100 l's in a second and they all be red. Plz help me

item.title: How do you change the color of text on your client?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Draco Owner Draco
item.description:
@Owner_Draco wrote:

I know but like… What do i search. like green is 65280
how can i make it so my letters are red to other players so i dont have to type red:(message)

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the color of text on your client?

item.title: How do you change the color of text on your client?
item.dc:creator: @Honor_Swords Honor Swords
item.description:
@Honor_Swords wrote:

in client.java find where you want to type the text by using ctr F then use these right before your text
@red@-Red
@yel@-Yellow
@gre@-Green
@cya@-Cyan
@blu@-Blue
@mag@-Magenta (Purple, Violet)
@dre@-Dark Red
@dbl@-Dark Blue
@whi@-White
@bla@-Black

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the color of text on your client?
